body:
Could you explain why there is a difference in representations of `kernel_size` [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/pooling.py#L69) and [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/pooling.py#L146):
```
str(self.kernel_size)
```
vs
```
kh, kw = _pair(self.kernel_size)
'size=(' + str(kh) + ', ' + str(kw) + ')'
```
Probably, we can just use the first one

**EDIT**: Ok, I understand the difference, probably [this](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/conv.py#L49) is better choice
